# iru_device_action_blank_push (Action)

Sends a blank push to a specific device. This is an imperative action used to wake up a device and prompt it to check in with the MDM server.

## Example Usage

```terraform
action "iru_device_action_blank_push" "example" {
  device_id = "8a9f88d9-e7f4-47e6-9326-fd4b39534c4e"
}
```

<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.
